commandParameter.code:
{
    "async": true,
    "id": "e7ee9f86-d531-4adc-8985-e9ce691106eb",
    "inputs": {
        "serverWorkflowUrl": $workflowConfiguration.result.serverWorkflowURL,
        "report": {
            "viewerUrl": $workflowConfiguration.result.viewerUrl,
            "reportName": $workflowConfiguration.result.reportName,
            "projectLine": $formattedProjecLine1.result,
            "projectName": $regionalProgramForm.state.projectNameTextBox.value,
            "jurisdiction": $regionalProgramForm.state.jurisdictionTextBox.value,
            "projectType": $regionalProgramForm.state.projectTypeDropDownList.value,
            "email": $regionalProgramForm.state.emailTextBox.value,
            "ADT": $regionalProgramForm.state.numberADT.value.numeric,
            "postedSpeedLimit": $regionalProgramForm.state.numberPSL.value.numeric,
            "PCI": $regionalProgramForm.state.numberPCI.value.numeric,
            "titleReport": $workflowConfiguration.result.projects.filter(function (project) { return project.name == $regionalProgramForm.state.projectTypeDropDownList.value; })[0].titleReport,
            "reports": $workflowConfiguration.result.projects.filter(function (project) { return project.name == $regionalProgramForm.state.projectTypeDropDownList.value; })[0].report.filter(function (report) { return $regionalProgramForm.state.itemPicker1.value.items.map(function (item) { return item.value; }).includes(report.name); })
        }
    }
}
